product_name: The North Face GTD Tights - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether worn alone or paired with an outer layer in cold weather, The North Face GTD tights offer excellent support from performance fabric that helps keep you comfortable during long training runs. VaporWick(R) fabric is designed to wick moisture and dry quickly during those all-out sessions where you've got nothing left to give. Supportive fabric and back-of-the-knee mesh panels keep hard-working muscles comfortable when it's go time. Elastic waist with drawstring ensures a comfortable, secure fit. Need to stash some extra fuel for that last mile? A rear zippered pocket holds small items while keeping shifting to a minimum. Calf zippers make dressing over shoes easy. The North Face GTD tights feature reflective highlights that increase visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: Whether worn alone or paired with an outer layer in cold weather, The North Face GTD tights offer excellent support from performance fabric that helps keep you comfortable during long training runs.
